title: Video: How we studied the lessons of Ukraine
subtitle: Inside our correspondent’s investigation into the future of war

contents.text: Shashank Joshi, The Economist’s defence editor, has spent months analysing how technology is reshaping warfare. Artificial intelligence, drones and satellites are increasingly changing the characteristics of war, but old lessons still matter. Here he explores what can be learned from the Ukraine war, which has become a testbed for technologies of the future.
